events.message: I am writing to report that my order, placed two weeks ago, has not yet been delivered and the tracking information has not been updated.
The system has categorized the customer's issue under Delivery Delay based on keywords indicating a late shipment and tracking issues.
An agent specializing in shipment and delivery concerns has been assigned to handle the customer's case to provide timely assistance.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand your order has not arrived yet, and I am here to help resolve this delay for you.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm the shipping address so I can investigate the delay with our courier service?
Thank you for your reply. My order number is 123456789 and the shipping address provided at checkout is 789 Elm Street, Springfield.
We have contacted the courier service regarding your order and expect an updated delivery status within 24 hours. We will keep you informed.
I appreciate the prompt response and look forward to receiving the update soon. Thank you for your assistance.
The courier has confirmed that your package was out for delivery this morning and should arrive shortly. Please notify us if it does not arrive today.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received your order and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As we have not received any further messages, we are closing your case. Thank you for your patience and please reach out anytime if you require help.
